title: Computer freezing when I start a match and I can't play
body: So, this has recently started happening after the latest patch, but I can't know for sure if that is the reason nor what to do to fix it. As soon as I start a match, my entire computer freezes and I have to force shut down my  computer because even after waiting 30+ minutes, it was still frozen. I have tried multiple times, and even custom matches, and it still freezes. I decided to do a fresh and clean reinstall, and all that did was cause my computer to freeze faster. It also does not seem to be overheating. I have seen this problem on other posts, but none of them had answers, so help would be great.

replies.body: Disabled game bar and uninstalled Xbox app all together, I'll let ya know how it goes

If you're running Windows 10, this could be related to the Anniversary update that has been rolling out for the last month. This update enables the Game DVR feature inside of the Xbox Game Bar. I recommend [disabling this feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves your issue if you're running Windows 10 of course.

Let me know if this helped.
Hey man, Im having the same problem. Did this start happening after you got a windows 10 update earlier this week?
